channel.title: Picking flax doesn't work?

item.title: Picking flax doesn't work?
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

For some reason, my flaxpicking case doesn’t work. I used the flax in Seers (ID 2646) and they just won’t work.

case 2646: if(flaxTimer == 0) { flaxTimer = 2; startAnimation(827); addItem(1779, 1); sendMessage("You pick some flax."); } break;

I tried taking out the brackets, and the timer, but it just doesn’t work. Any ideas?

Note: I have it right above my trees, and right after doors (THEY ALL WORK FINE)

Read full topic
